item.title: Create your own Etherscan with React in 5 minutes
item.description: Photo by Radek Grzybowski on Unsplash In this tutorial, we'll create a simple single-page etherscan in reactjs. For the clean UI, we are going to use the amazing semantic-ui-react which is the official react integration for semantic-ui. You can find the complete code in the github. Without wasting any time let's build it. Prerequisite nodejs Code editor – (I am using VS Code)
